Minichamps 430818502 Ford Capri Turbo 1981 DRM Series Div.II Winner K. Ludwig

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer page: https://minichamps.de/EN/Models/ModelDetails/430818502/index.html

1981 was the final season for the DRM series and Klaus Ludwig & the Ford Capri went out in style winning 11 of the 13 events. The 2 non-wins were DNFs leaving one to wonder if Ludwig could have won every event.
